email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
email.exists: An account with this email already exists
email.notFound: No account found with this email address

password.tooWeak: Password is too weak. Please make it stronger
password.minLength: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
password.complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character

mfa.expired: Authentication code has expired. Please request a new one

model.invalid: Please select a valid attribution model
model.incompatible: Selected model is not compatible with current configuration

weights.invalid: Invalid weight value. Please enter a number between 0 and 100
weights.minWeight: Minimum weight for each channel is {{min}}%
weights.maxWeight: Maximum weight for each channel is {{max}}%

timeWindow.invalid: Please select a valid time window
timeWindow.minDays: Time window must be at least {{min}} days
timeWindow.overlap: Time windows cannot overlap with existing configurations

dateRange.invalid: Please select a valid date range
dateRange.future: Date range cannot include future dates
dateRange.minRange: Date range must be at least {{min}} days

filters.required: At least one filter is required
filters.duplicate: Duplicate filter values are not allowed

metrics.required: At least one metric must be selected

input.alphanumeric: Only letters and numbers are allowed
input.email: Must be a valid email address
input.phone: Must be a valid phone number
